mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, r.ACCOUNTID, (r.ACCOUNTID=${ACCOUNTID}) 'editable', r.STOREID, r.REVIEWCONTENT, r.WRITEDATE, r.TASTELEVEL, r.PRICELEVEL, r.SERVICELEVEL, r.MOODLEVEL, r.CONVENIENCELEVEL, AVERAGELEVEL, r.LIKECOUNT, r.HATECOUNT, ifnull((SELECT isLike FROM LIKEHATE l WHERE r.review_id = l.review_id AND l.ACCOUNT_ID = #{ACCOUNTID}),0) "isLike", a.NICKNAME, a.FOLLOWCOUNT, a.REVIEWCOUNT FROM REVIEW r JOIN ACCOUNT a ON r.ACCOUNTID = a.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE r.STOREID = #{STOREID} ORDER BY FIELD(r.ACCOUNTID,#{ACCOUNTID}) DESC, r.LIKECOUNT DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKEHATE(review_id, account_id, isLike) VALUES(#{REVIEW_ID}, #{ACCOUNT_ID}, #{ISLIKE})
mapper.update: UPDATE LIKEHATE SET isLike=#{ISLIKE } WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID} AND account_id = #{ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKEHATE WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID} AND account_id = #{ACCOUNT_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET likeCount = #{LIKECOUNT} WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID}
UPDATE REVIEW SET hateCount = #{HATECOUNT} WHERE review_id = #{REVIEW_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT likeCount FROM REVIEW WHERE review_id = #{id}
SELECT hateCount FROM REVIEW WHERE review_id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM LIKEHATE WHERE isLike=1 AND review_id = #{id} ) l GROUP BY isLike;
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM LIKEHATE WHERE isLike=-1 AND review_id = #{id} ) l GROUP BY isLike;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(ACCOUNTID, STOREID, REVIEWCONTENT, WRITEDATE, TASTELEVEL, PRICELEVEL, SERVICELEVEL, MOODLEVEL, CONVENIENCELEVEL, AVERAGELEVEL, LIKECOUNT,HATECOUNT) VALUES(#{accountId}, #{storeId}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), #{tasteLevel}, #{priceLevel}, #{serviceLevel}, #{moodLevel}, #{convenienceLevel}, #{averageLevel}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, r.ACCOUNTID, r.STOREID, r.REVIEWCONTENT, r.WRITEDATE, r.TASTELEVEL, r.PRICELEVEL, r.SERVICELEVEL, r.MOODLEVEL, r.CONVENIENCELEVEL, AVERAGELEVEL, r.LIKECOUNT, r.HATECOUNT, a.NICKNAME, a.FOLLOWCOUNT, a.REVIEWCOUNT FROM REVIEW r JOIN ACCOUNT a ON r.ACCOUNTID = a.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{id} ORDER BY r.WRITEDATE DESC LIMIT 1;
